mapper.select: select w.* from favorites fav left join `work` w on fav.favorite_id = w.id where w.is_del = 0 and w.work_status !=2 and fav.user_address = #{userAddress} and fav.`type` = 2 order by fav.create_time desc

select `work`.*,dao.dao_logo_url,canvas.canvas_logo,dao.dao_floor_price,dao.dao_status,dao.dao_name from `work` left join dao as dao on `work`.dao_id = dao.id left join canvas as canvas on `work`.can_id = canvas.id where `work`.is_del = 0 and `work`.work_status = 1 order by `work`.minted_price desc,`work`.id desc
select * from `work` where is_del = 0 and work_status = 1 and owner_address = #{userAddress} order by block_time desc
select * from `work` where is_del = 0 and work_status = 1 and minted_address = #{userAddress} order by block_time desc
select * from `work` where is_del = 0 and generate = 2 and work_status = 0 and creator_address = #{userAddress} order by id desc
